name: Constellation_Station: Liberation
description:
Constellation Station: Liberation is a Sci Fi visual novel following a teen searching for their best friend. Join Pluto as they search for their missing friend and try to mend their broken community aboard Constellation Station; A spaceship run by two rival companies with generations of feuding under their belt. Made by a small student team at GGJ 2020 in Portland, OR. 

This version of the game was made in 48 hours, as part of the Global Game Jam 2020. Future updates in order to refine and better the game will come soon. We hope you look forward to them and enjoy Constellation Station: Liberation.
